name: Rapunzel's Tower
description:
IMPORTANT NOTE: This game was made for the 1 Room RPG Jam and is, for now, abandoned in the current state. If you decide to play and encounter a bug, I'll be grateful if you let me know. <3

--

You're Rapunzel, leader of the revolutionary movement against your corrupt government. Unfortunately, you're temporarily out of the action -- the government has locked you up in a tower! 

It's up to you to grow your hair long enough to help your fellow protestors get you out. Don't lose hope!

Controls are mouse-only.

Music is "Airship Serenity" by Imcompetech.

Pixel fonts by Chevy, available here on itch.io!
